mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_email, user_password, user_name, user_phone_number, user_gender, user_birthday, user_auth_type, zip_code, user_address, user_address_detail) values(#{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userGender}, #{userBirthday}, #{userAuthType}, #{zipCode}, #{userAddress}, #{userAddressDetail})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_email, user_phone_number, user_date_join, user_gender, user_status, user_detail from tbl_user
